fields.label: What is the animal's reaction if you approach it when it is feeding?

fields.name: feedingregime
fields.label: Please describe your animal's feeding regime - brands of food, scraps, dry or tinned, flavours, feeding times and quantities. Any dislikes?

fields.name: neutered
fields.label: Has the animal been neutered?

fields.name: commands
fields.label: What commands does your animal obey? And what commands are used? For example, sit or sit down; lie or lie down etc.

fields.label: Owner's reason for parting with animal

fields.name: housetrained
fields.label: Is the animal housetrained?

fields.name: travelwell
fields.label: Does the animal travel well in cars?

fields.name: leavealone
fields.label: Do you leave the animal alone for any period of time? If so, how long for and do you have concerns about them being on their own?

fields.name: destructive
fields.label: Has the animal ever been destructive in the house? Please describe

fields.label: Where does the animal sleep?

fields.name: giveuptoys
fields.label: Will the animal give up toys when commanded to?

fields.name: gentleplayer
fields.label: Would you describe your animal as a gentle player or does he/she like "rough" play? Describe your animal's play activity, eg. favourite game, favourite toy, etc.

fields.name: reactgrooming
fields.label: How does your animal react to grooming?

fields.name: reactvets
fields.label: hHow does your animal behave at the vets?

fields.name: reactdonewrong
fields.label: How does your animal react when he/she has done something wrong? How do you "tell him off"?

fields.name: pullonlead
fields.label: Does the animal pull on the lead?

fields.name: recall
fields.label: Does your animal return when called whilst off the lead?

name: RSPCA Entry Assessment: Dog
description: Answering these questions honestly will not stop the RSPCA from admitting your animal but will ensure that we are able to provide the correct care for your animal.  Please help us to help your animal.
